New Records: Janith Liyanage scored his maiden ODI century with an unbeaten 101 off 102 balls.
Key Match Events: Tanzid Hasan came on as a concussion substitute and struck a career-best 84.
Rishad Hossain scored an unbeaten 48 off 18 balls, including four sixes and five fours.
Taskin Ahmed took three wickets to restrict Sri Lanka to 235.
Kumara took four wickets for 48 runs.
Bangladesh won by 4 wickets with 58 balls remaining.
Post-Match Reflections: Shanto lauded Rishad's performance, stating that a player like him makes life easier for a captain.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Three players got injured in the last three overs of the first innings.
Umpire Tanvir Ahmed replaced Richard Kettleborough due to the latter falling sick from the heat.
